summary: A small house in Morrowind style. Hermit's Stump is located in the marvelous Hermit's Cave near the Hillgrund's Tomb (On the way to Ivarstead).
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]Hermit's Stump[/b]

A small house in Morrowind style. 
Hermit's Stump is located in the marvelous Hermit's Cave near the Hillgrund's Tomb (On the way to Ivarstead). 
Look for map marker when you start game. 

[url=https://www.patreon.com/haemprojects][size=2][img]http://tesall.ru/uploads/imgs/pre_1535556014__11111.png[/img][/size][size=5]﻿[b]Support Haem Projects on Patreon![/b][/size][/url]﻿

[center][youtube]YpfZOXSV9Hw[/youtube][/center]

[b]Features: [/b]
Unusual design;
All crafting stations;
Planters;
Common containers and bookshelves;
Solstheim music in interiors; 

[b]Uninstall: [/b]
Before uninstalling mod empty all containers and exit interior cell. 

[b]Created by: [/b]
Haem Projects (Dimonoider & gkalian)
[b]Contact Us:[/b]
haemprojects@gmail.com
[/size]
[b]Support us!
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/haemprojects
PayPal: haemprojects@gmail.com[/b]
